show.title: PineTalk Podcast
show.subtitle: A Community Podcast
show.summary:
We discuss PINE64 hardware, software and open source in general.
Send in your questions!
A community ran podcast for the community.

Contact:
Email: pinetalk@pine64.org
Twitter: @TalkPine

title: 003: Quartzy Keyboards
subtitle: In the third episode of PineTalk, Ezra and Peter discuss the PINE64 February Community Update and answer community questions about Sxmo, RISC-V, and ARM Workstations.
summary:
In the third episode of PineTalk, Ezra and Peter discuss the PINE64 February Community Update and answer community questions about Sxmo, RISC-V, and ARM Workstations.

Remember: This is a community podcast, we need your questions, ideas and input to make this work! Also, please leave feedback on what we should do better!

chapters.title: What have we been up to lately?
RISC-V SBC with two RISC-V SoCs
